title: Tatton Park Walk and Cycle Route

images.title: Ian Warburton / Tatton Mere (Tatton Park)
images.caption: Tatton Mere (Tatton Park) Looking north (Taken from 'Dog Wood )

images.title: Gary Rogers / Lake in Tatton Park
images.caption: Lake in Tatton Park. The smaller of two lakes (Melchett Mere) in the area lies in the south west corner of the grid square. Picture taken looking south.

images.title: Chris Allen / Home Farm, Tatton Park
images.caption: Home Farm. This complex was originally steam powered and the National Trust installed a horizontal single cylinder engine that had come via a private collector from the Colne Vale Dye & Chemical Co, Milnsbridge. I saw it running there in 1980.

images.title: JThomas / Entrance to Tatton Park
images.caption: Entrance to Tatton Park. Off Ashley Road.

images.title: David Long / Tatton Hall
images.caption: Tatton Hall. This side of the house can be seen in the episode "The Greek Interpreter" (1985) from the tv series "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes", in the film "The Hound of the Baskervilles" (1988), in the tv episodes "Shoscombe Old Place" (1991), "The Master Blackmailer" (1992) and "The Eligible Bachelor" (1993) from the series The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes and in "The Three Gables" (1994) from The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes, all starring Jeremy Brett as Sherlock Holmes.

images.title: David Dixon / Marble Bench in Tatton Park Tower Garden
images.caption: Marble Bench in Tatton Park Tower Garden. This semi-circular Verona marble bench with ends in the form of winged lions is at the edge of the Tower Garden.

description: Explore the wonderful 1000 acre deer park on this walk or cycle in Knutsford, Cheshire. The route takes you around Tatton Hall, Tatton Mere and the beautiful Italian and Japanese gardens (see video below).  Also of interest is the rare-breed farm with cattle, horses, sheep, pigs, goats and donkeys to see up close. Tatton Park was the winner of Cheshire's Large Visitor Attraction of the Year 2009 and 2010. Cycles can be hired in the park for reasonable rates too.
